metadata.synopsis: Viconia performs a sermon for the Sharrans. Some onlookers may utter reponses to parts of the sermon.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Enter the training hall of the Grotto and don't get near Viconia

1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
1.text: Those who cling to light are destined to lose it. Candles will gutter. Hearths will burn low. The stars will dim.
1.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
2.text: Shed no tears for such fools. They are unworthy of Lady Shar's truth, and doom themselves.
2.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

6.speaker: Viconia DeVir
6.text: We shall leave them behind. The Nightsinger shall lead us to our reward.
6.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

16.speaker: Sharran Novice Humboldt
16.text: There can be no reward without loss. No salvation without sacrifice.
16.context: NodeContext: Solemn conviction. Uttered during a sermon/guided prayer being conducted by the chief Sharran,

12.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
12.text: Lady Shar smiles upon our endeavours.
12.context: NodeContext: Solemn conviction. Uttered during a sermon/guided prayer being conducted by the chief Sharran,

5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
5.text: Each of you has suffered in your own way and sought out the Nightsinger.
5.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

11.speaker: Viconia DeVir
11.text: The gift of loss will soothe all woes, but only for those who deserve it.
11.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

4.speaker: Viconia DeVir
4.text: Assure your place at her side. Serve her to your last breath, and you shall have no fear of death.
4.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

9.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
9.text: There is no fear but the fear of failing the Nightsinger.
9.context: NodeContext: Solemn conviction. Uttered during a sermon/guided prayer being conducted by the chief Sharran,

18.speaker: Sharran Novice Dollay
18.text: Lady Shar watches our every step.
18.context: NodeContext: Solemn conviction. Uttered during a sermon/guided prayer being conducted by the chief Sharran,

7.speaker: Viconia DeVir
7.text: Together, we shall watch light be snuffed from the world, with joy in our hearts.
7.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

0.speaker: Viconia DeVir
0.text: We shall be robed in black satin, and embraced by Lady Shar, beneath an extinguished sun.
0.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

15.speaker: Viconia DeVir
15.text: All burdens shall be lifted. All pains forgotten. We shall be free.
15.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

19.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
19.text: Free from light. Free from pain. Free from all burdens.
19.context: NodeContext: Solemn conviction. Uttered during a sermon/guided prayer being conducted by the chief Sharran,

14.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
14.text: Lady Shar shall restore us to our purest form.
14.context: NodeContext: Solemn conviction. Uttered during a sermon/guided prayer being conducted by the chief Sharran,

17.speaker: Viconia DeVir
17.text: Lady Shar's darkness awaits us all - but how shall you meet it?
17.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

8.speaker: Viconia DeVir
8.text: When the time comes, shall you be embraced by the dark, or devoured by it?
8.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

13.speaker: Viconia DeVir
13.text: Only your actions can determine your reward... or punishment.
13.context: NodeContext: Preaching to a gathering of Shar worshippers

3.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
3.text: We shall serve. We shall be embraced.
3.context: NodeContext: Solemn conviction. Uttered during a sermon/guided prayer being conducted by the chief Sharran,

10.speaker: Sharran Novice Monteith
10.context: NodeContext: Solemn conviction. Uttered during a sermon/guided prayer being conducted by the chief Sharran,
